headline: Teledyne FLIR OEM Advances State of the Art in Infrared Imaging
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., February 10, 2026--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) today recognized the agile performance, innovation, and production scale of its business unit, Teledyne FLIR OEM. As the global leader in intelligent thermal imaging systems, Teledyne FLIR OEM operates as a commercial foundry with unmatched vertical integration. Serving defense primes, industrial customers, and commercial markets with the speed and flexibility of a non-traditional defense contractor, the comp
